name: normalize
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: normalize
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to return to the normal or usual situation
trans_examp.trans_cn: （使）恢复正常，（使）恢复常态；（使）正常化

example.eg: They claim that the new drug normalizes blood pressure.
example.egtrans: 他们声称这种新药能使血压恢复正常。

example.eg: Relations between the two countries are gradually normalizing.
example.egtrans: 两国关系正逐渐恢复正常。

dsense.name: normalize
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you normalize information, you compare a small set of information with a set that represents normal values.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （通过同常规化信息相比较）使标准化

example.eg: Research psychologists normalize the results of their studies by comparing their subjects' behaviour with that of the general public.
example.egtrans: 研究心理学家们通过将其研究对象的行为和大众行为比较来使其研究成果标准化。
